title: League of Legends affecting my mouse?
body: I've noticed this starting to happen yesterday.  As soon as the game window is launched, my mouse speed increases.  It's definitely League of Legends.  I do use Yolomouse, but after disabling it, nothing changes.  I've also tried using a different account and it still occurs.  So it's definitely not user settings.  What could this possibly be?

replies.body:
The mouse in League is hard coded to change your raw mouse sensitivity after you launch into game, this is working as intended. You can always adjust your mouse sensitivity in-game to match what your Windows mouse settings are at so there is a minimal change when in-game.

If you have any questions, let me know.

This hasn't been happening until yesterday.  Also it is changing my settings outside of the game as well.

League's mouse settings are designed to take priority over your windows mouse settings. I can't comment on why it worked differently for you in the past, but as of right now, it sounds like it's working as intended. I recommend hopping into a custom match to tweak your mouse settings before you enter a live game, to eliminate the awkward transition or discomfort.

Let me know if you have any other concerns.
